title: 2019 Ford Transit Connect With Air Compressor
item_description:

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, and Smog certificate will be mailed within 1 week of removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, sales tax, and fees due to the DMV.
